1.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Ledo and Ix are like us. Sleeping under the stars makes them philosophical. Sometimes they wonder if they should have chosen different careers. But in one crucial way, they're different--they're adventurers in a small-scale video game epic.

2.title: Ledo and Ix Go to Town, Part I

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: The continued adventures of Ledo and Ix. This time our heroes confront an upcoming blob on the map that might be either a village or brain fungus.

3.title: Ledo and Ix Go to Town, Part II

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: The continued adventures of Ledo and Ix. This time our heroes confront an upcoming blob on the map that might be either a village or brain fungus.

4.title: Ledo and Ix Battle Epically

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Ledo finally gets the battle she's been looking for; it is not what she expects.

5.title: Ledo and Ix and the Mysterious Girl

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Ix gains a strange companion and has a game over dream.

6.title: Ledo and Ix and Evidently, the Princess

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Ledo and Ix stumble upon the king and nearly discover their very own quest.

7.title: Ledo and Ix and the Dramatic Backstory

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Ledo returns to her childhood home looking for answers. She's not sure if her family were farmers or fisherfolk, but she's pretty sure she must seek vengeance.

8.title: Ledo and Ix and Another, Conflicting Princess

episode of.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (TV Series 2011– )

imdb.title: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix
akas: The Adventures of Ledo and Ix (United States)
plot: _The Adventures of Ledo and Ix_ (qv) uses the visual vocabulary of retro video games to explore the human fear of both the unknown and the known.::Penny Arcade
